sentences.en: And this year I won for the biggest pumpkin.
sentences.cn: 今年我获得了最大的南瓜.

sentences.en: Dashing in the dark night, in your pumpkin, searching the crystal.
sentences.cn: 南瓜马车的午夜, 找寻你的玻璃鞋.

sentences.en: He clove the pumpkin with his kitchen knife.
sentences.cn: 他用菜刀把那南瓜剖开.

sentences.en: I warrant you, he thought I had a pumpkin on my shoulders.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证, 他以为我肩膀上顶着的是一颗南瓜.

sentences.en: I will serve coffee and pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 我来准备咖啡和南瓜派.

sentences.en: I would like to have pumpkin in the salad.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢在沙拉里放点儿南瓜.

sentences.en: It looks like there is a person looking out of the pumpkin!
sentences.cn: 看起来就像南瓜里有人在看着你!

sentences.en: Most people eat turkey and pumpkin pie and other special dishes.
sentences.cn: 大多数人吃火鸡、南瓜馅饼和其他特制的菜.

sentences.en: Place all cooked ingredients into the pumpkin tureen and serve.
sentences.cn: 取出全部材料倒入南瓜盅内即成.

sentences.en: Quarter the pumpkin and remove the seeds.
The orthodox Thanksgiving dinner includes turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 传统的感恩节晚餐包括火鸡和南瓜馅饼.

sentences.en: The pumpkin is a real monster.
The pumpkin is the only esculent of the orange family that will thrive in the North.
sentences.cn: 南瓜是柑橘科中唯一能在北方种植的蔬菜.

sentences.en: They ate turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了火鸡和南瓜馅饼.

sentences.en: This Thanksgiving, my mom bought me a pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 今年的感恩节, 妈妈就给我买了南瓜派.

phrases.tran_cn: 南瓜（馅）饼，番瓜饼；南瓜派

trans.tran_cn: 南瓜，南瓜的果肉，南瓜囊，〈俚〉重要人物
trans.tran_en: a very large orange fruit that grows on the ground, or the inside of this fruit
